title: BRIEF-Insimbi Industrial Holdings Says Received Competition Commission Approval For Acquisition Of Treppo Group
text:
BRIEF-Insimbi Industrial Holdings Says Received Competition Commission Approval For Acquisition Of Treppo Group

Stock Markets 26 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 13:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Insimbi Industrial Holdings Says Received Competition Commission Approval For Acquisition Of Treppo Group Oct 15 (Reuters) - Insimbi Industrial Holdings Ltd : * JSE: ISB - FURTHER UPDATE TO SHAREHOLDERS RELATING TO THE ACQUISITION OF TREPPO GROUP PROPRIETARY LIMITED (“TREPPO”) * INSIMBI INDUSTRIAL HOLDINGS LTD - UNCONDITIONAL COMPETITION COMMISSION APPROVAL HAS NOW BEEN RECEIVED FOR ACQUISITION OF TREPPO GROUP * INSIMBI INDUSTRIAL HOLDINGS LTD - EXPECTED THAT TREPPO TRANSACTION WILL BE IMPLEMENTED BY END OF OCTOBER 2019

BRIEF-Insimbi Industrial Holdings Says Received Competition Commission Approval For Acquisition Of Treppo Group
description: BRIEF-Insimbi Industrial Holdings Says Received Competition Commission Approval For Acquisition Of Treppo Group
